meanings.definition: Not open to discussion or dispute; indisputable.
meanings.sent1: The fact that the sun rises in the east is undebatable.
meanings.sent3: His love for ice cream is undebatable; he eats it every day!
meanings.sent4: The impact of her words was undebatable, leaving everyone speechless.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset was undebatable, painting the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The undebatable decision was made by the judge.
meanings.sent2: Her undebatable victory in the race was celebrated by all.
meanings.sent3: The undebatable truth finally came to light, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The undebatable importance of education cannot be overstated.
meanings.sent5: The undebatable presence of stars in the night sky mesmerized the onlookers.
